contentList.content: Hurl a sphere that deals [1] or the same amount of another chosen damage type.
Hurl caustic energy that damages the target.
Hurl freezing energy that damages the target.
Hurl fiery energy that damages the target.
Hurl lightning energy that damages the target.
Hurl poisonous energy that damages the target.

Gain ability Hex Target which curses a target to make your attacks deal additional [1] damage and give it <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Hex Target can be applied to a new creature without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> but can only be applied to one target at a time.
Hex a new target without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Hex
Hex Target
The Hexed creature takes additional damage whenever you attack it and has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Hexed
Creature suffers an additional [1] from the spellcaster. It also has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Hex Target (Strength)
Hex Target (Dexterity)
Hex Target (Constitution)
Hex Target (Intelligence)
Hex Target (Wisdom)
Hex Target (Charisma)
Gain ability Mark Target which can be applied to a target to mark it as your quarry. Your attacks deal additional [1] whenever you hit it with a weapon attack.
Mark Target can be applied to a new creature without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> but can only be applied to one target at a time.
Mark Target
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNTERS_MARK">Mark</LSTag> a new target without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNTERS_MARK">Mark Target</LSTag> can be applied to a new creature without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> but can only be applied to one target at a time.
Hunting
Can use a bonus action to apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNTERS_MARK">Mark Target</LSTag> to another target.
Dice size increases with spell level.

Force an enemy to attack only you, giving it <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> against other targets. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against the target of your duel.

Shoot a ray of vile energy at the target and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> it. Causes a poisonous explosion at the target which chains to a secondary target for reduced damage. Chains to [1] additional target(s) losing [2] with each jump.
Chains to an additional target and damage increased by [1] per level.
Link yourself to one or more targets with a bolt of lightning. Deal an additional [1] to all linked targets by activating it.
Activate the bolt and deal [1] to all linked targets.

The thorns deal [1] to the target and then explode. The explosion deals an additional [2] to the target and surrounding creatures, possibly causing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>.

Weaken a foe - they deal half damage with weapon attacks using <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>. They also have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. The spell chains to [1] secondary target(s).

Deal only half damage with weapon attacks that use <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Cast at 5th or 6th, attack bonus increases to +2 and damage to 2d4. At 7th and higher, attack bonus increases to +3 and damage to 3d4.
Imbue a weapon with a corrosive might. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Imbue a weapon with an icy might. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Imbue a weapon with a fiery might. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Imbue a weapon with an electrical might. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Imbue a weapon with a thunderous might. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [2].
Has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals an additional [2].

Curse a target creature. You can cause either a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VAL_BESTOWCURSE_CURSE_PHYSICAL">Debilitating Curse</LSTag> or an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VAL_BESTOWCURSE_CURSE_MENTAL">Addling Curse</LSTag>.
Bestow Curse: Debilitate

Curse a target creature. It suffers <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> as well as <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and takes an additional [1] from all attacks.

Suffering a debilitating curse causing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> as well as <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and takes an additional [1] from all attacks.
Bestow Curse: Addle

Curse a target creature. It suffers <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> each turn or take no actions that turn.

Suffering a addling curse causing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> each turn or take no actions that turn.
Deals an additional [1] and the dice size for the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VAL_SPELL_BLIGHT_BLIGHTED">Blighted</LSTag> condition increases by 1 per level.

Inflict a target with blight. Attacking a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VAL_SPELL_BLIGHT_BLIGHTED">Blighted</LSTag> target spreads the blight. Plants take maximum damage from the initial cast, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> against all effects of this spell. Undead have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against the effects of this spell.
Blighted

Affected entity has -1d4 to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and suffers [1] every turn. Unarmed and weapon attacks against it spread <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VAL_SPELL_BLIGHT_BLIGHTED">Blighted</LSTag> to nearby enemies ([2] for melee and [3] for ranged). If a nearby target is already affected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VAL_SPELL_BLIGHT_BLIGHTED">Blighted</LSTag> they suffer [4] instead.
Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies restoring [1] immediately and [2] every turn for [3] turns.
Affected entity restores [1] every turn.
Elemental Weapon Master
Protection from Energy Master
Magic Weapon Master
Initial heal restores an additional [1] per level and duration of the heal over time is extended 1 turn per level.

Your weapon becomes magical: it deals [1], and uses your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. Can be used on a club, mace, quarterstaff, javelin, spear or trident.
Target creature is assailed by a fearsome phantasm and becomes <LSTag Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and takes [1] each turn.
Target creature is assailed by a fearsome phantasm and is <LSTag Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and takes [1] each turn.
